    @allure.title("Test the swab & rinse limit of equipment map to production")
    @allure.description("This test case test the swab & rinse sample limit of equipment map with production for"
                        "formulation when all (toxicity, dosage, default) criteria is selected & for active "
                        "facility when all (toxicity, dosage, default, LD50) and swab & rinse sample unit is in mg/ml"

    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86ctx5kdp")
    @pytest.mark.swab_rinse_limit
    @pytest.mark.validate_swab_rinse_sampling_limit_for_all_mg_ml_sqin
    def test_validate_swab_rinse_sampling_limit_for_all_mg_ml_sqin(self):
        policy_data = {"useSwabPerSampleLimit": False, "useRinsePerSampleLimit": False, "swabSampleUnit": "mg/ml",
                       "rinseSampleUnit": "mg/ml"}
        data = {}
        get_policy = json.loads(self.update_active_policy.test_get_active_cleaning_limit_policy())
        get_policy = get_policy["policy"]
        swab_unit = get_policy["limitRepresentation"]["sampleLimits"]["swab"]["unit"]
        rinse_unit = get_policy["limitRepresentation"]["sampleLimits"]["rinse"]["unit"]
        update_policy = create_cleaning_limit_policy_active_pyload(get_policy, policy_data)
    
        data.update({"update_policy_payload": update_policy})
        data.update(self.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQIN)
        self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(data)
        data.update(self.DEFAULT_VOLUME)
        self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(data)
        if get_policy != update_policy["data"] or rinse_unit != "mg/ml" or swab_unit != "mg/ml":
            self.update_active_policy.test_update_active_policy(data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        production_id = PRODUCTION_ID
        for prod in production_id:
            data.update({"production_id": prod})
            swab_sheet_name = prod.lower() + "_swab"
            rinse_sheet_name = prod.lower() + "_rinse"
            swab_columns = ["Equipment ID", "swab_limit_mg_ml"]
            rinse_columns = ["Equipment ID", "rinse_limit_mg_ml"]
            manually_calculated_swab_limit = self.calculated_chemical_excel(swab_sheet_name, swab_columns)
            manually_calculated_rinse_limit = self.calculated_chemical_excel(rinse_sheet_name, rinse_columns)
            data.update({"production": prod})
            swab_limit = self.get_production.get_production_swab_limit_each_equipment(data)
>           compare_chemical(swab_limit, manually_calculated_swab_limit, swab_columns, self.ERROR_MESSAGE)
